definitions.body: :Le 7:33 cf. Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 76 f., so Ar., v. Lane W:AG. § 290 (d)] leg;—´[[שׁ]]: abs. 1Sa 9:24 +, cstr. Ex 29:27 +; du. [[שׁׂקַיִם]] De 28:35 Pr 26:7, cstr. [[שׁוֹקֵי]] Ps 147:10, sf. [[שׁוֹקָיו]] Ct So 5:15;—leg:

of man, specif. lower leg, calf, disting. from thigh, in [[עֵל־יׇרֵח]] ´[[וַיַּח אוֹתָם שׁ]]: Ju Jdg 15:8 he smote them, leg upon thigh, i.e. utterly (cf. GFM), De 28:35 (‖[[כָּל־בִּרְכַּיִםם ]]), Pr 26:7, Ps 147:10, Ct So 5:15; of woman (city personif.) Is 47:2.

of sacrificial animal, specif. upper leg, thigh, hind leg, portion eaten 1Sa 9:24 (cf. Klein:ZPV vi (1883), 98, cited also by Nes:Marg. 13), [[הַיׇּמִין]] ´[[שׁ]]: right thigh Ex 29:32 + 6 t. P (v. [[יׇמִין]]), [[הַתְּדוּמָה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Le 7:34 + 4 t. P, thigh of contribution (v. ´[[ת]]: p. 929).—LXX braxi/wn, Vulgate armus, hence AV al. shoulder, but v. Di Baen Dr:De 18:3.
